sentence: But Pence, who has increasingly shown a willingness to buck his relationship with Trump in the past several months, is now throwing his weight behind Georgia's incumbent Republican Governor Brian Kemp.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump Heads to Texas Rally as Allies Face Subpoenas, Pence Clash Ramps Up

sentence: Perdue is the third Trump-backed governor candidate to lose in as many weeks https://t.co/Sie3a6qeqA pic.twitter.com/zLhCJkWtjm Grace Panetta (@grace_panetta) May 24, 2022 While the Associated Press and the networks have not yet called it, it is looking like a very big night for Brian Kemp.
author: Matthew Boyle
title: *** Election Night Livewire *** Georgia, Alabama, Texas, Arkansas, Minnesota Vote in Key Primaries
